Color Palette
Background Colors:

Primary background: #0d1117
Secondary background (panels, header): #161b22
Hover background: #161b22
Focused background: #1f2937
Selected background: #0969da (buckets), #0d419d (objects)

Border Colors:

Primary borders: #30363d
Focus indicator: #58a6ff
Selected item left border: #ffffff

Text Colors:

Primary text: #c9d1d9
Secondary text: #f0f6fc
Muted text: #7d8590
Selected text: #ffffff
Selected secondary text: #b6e3ff
Accent/link color: #58a6ff
Success/connected: #3fb950

Special Colors:

Folder icon: #f0883e
File icon: #7d8590
Key binding background: #21262d

Scrollbar Colors:

Track: #0d1117
Thumb: #30363d
Thumb hover: #484f58

Typography
Font Stack:
cssfont-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', 'Consolas', monospace;
Font Sizes:

Base font size: 13px
Small text (metadata, status): 11px
Tiny text (keybindings): 10px
Header status: 12px
Multi-select dots: 8px

Font Properties:

Line height: 1.4
Font weight: normal (no bold used)
Letter spacing for headers: 0.5px

Spacing & Layout
Padding Values:

Header: 8px 12px
Panel titles: 6px 12px
List items: 6px 12px (buckets), 4px 12px (objects)
Footer: 6px 12px
Key badges: 2px 4px

Margins:

Bucket metadata top margin: 1px
Icon gaps: 8px
Status info gaps: 16px
Keybinding gaps: 12px

Border Widths:

Standard borders: 1px
Focus left borders: 2px

Component Specifications
Grid Layout (Object List):
cssgrid-template-columns: 1fr 80px 120px 100px;
gap: 16px;
Scrollbar:

Width: 6px
Border radius: 3px

Panel Widths:

Left panel: 320px
Right panel: flex: 1 (remaining space)

Transitions:
csstransition: all 0.1s ease;
Icon Specifications
Unicode Icons Used:

Folder: üìÅ
File: üìÑ
Connected status: ‚óè
Multi-select indicator: ‚óè

Icon Sizes:

Object icons: 12px font-size, 14px width
Status indicator: inherited from parent
Multi-select dots: 8px
